  • Constructor Details

    • GameCtrl

      public GameCtrl()
      Constructs a new GameCtrl instance and initializes the game components. Initializes the JsonLoader, sets the initial room number, and prepares the rooms map.

  • Method Details

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      Initializes the game by loading the initial room data, creating a new player, setting the player in the room, adding the room to the rooms map, and updating the room view.
      Specified by:
      initializeGame in interface IGameCtrl

    • move

      public RoomElement[][] move(int key)
      Moves the player based on the given key input. Supports movement with arrow keys (38, 37, 40, 39) and WASD keys (87, 65, 83, 68). Checks boundaries and updates the room elements accordingly.
      Specified by:
      move in interface IGameCtrl
      Parameters:
      key - the key code representing the direction of movement
      Returns:
      a 2D array of RoomElement representing the new state of the room after movement

    • runCombat

      public void runCombat(int dificulte, RoomElement elem)
      Runs a combat scenario at a given difficulty level room element. Executes a test using the TestRunner and updates the game view based on the test result.
      Parameters:
      dificulte - the difficulty level of the combat
      elem - the room element representing the enemy

    • showItemDesc

      public void showItemDesc(String desc)
      Displays the description of an item in the game view.
      Parameters:
      desc - the description of the item to be displayed

    • navigateRooms

      public void navigateRooms(Door.Direction e)
      Navigates to a different room based on the given direction. Loads the next room if it has not been visited before and updates the player's position near the door.
      Parameters:
      e - the direction to navigate (TOP, BOTTOM, LEFT, RIGHT)

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer(Player player, int row, int col)
      Sets the player instance and places the player at the specified position in the current room.
      Parameters:
      player - the player instance to be set
      row - the row position to place the player
      col - the column position to place the player

    • getCurrentRoom

      public Room getCurrentRoom()

    • setCurrentRoom

      public void setCurrentRoom(Room currentRoom)

    • setGameView

      public void setGameView(IGameView gameView)
      Sets the game view instance.
      Specified by:
      setGameView in interface IGameCtrl
      Parameters:
      gameView - the game view instance to be set

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom()
      Updates the room view by refreshing its content and setting the room description in the game view.

    • AddRoom

      public void AddRoom(Room room)
      Adds a room to the rooms map using the current room number as the key.
      Parameters:
      room - the room instance to be added

    • executeCommand

      public boolean executeCommand(String command)
      Executes a game command input by the player. Supports commands such as "regarder murs", "regarder inventaire", "prendre item", and "poser item".
      Specified by:
      executeCommand in interface IGameCtrl
      Parameters:
      command - the command string input by the player
      Returns:
      true if the command was executed successfully, false otherwise
